body:
There is a game out online called Dragon Eternity and it is a place where its RPG battles against monsters and players! There are major tournaments/Arenas you need to know about:

* Arena of honor  Min level: 4.     4-5, 6-8, 9-15, 16-21, 22-28, 29-35, 36-43, 44-50, 52-60, 61-70.
*Seven Bridges of Shadan Min level: 6        6–8, 9-15, 16–21, 22–28, 29–35, 36-43, 44-50, 52-60, 61-70.
*Tournament of Honor Min level: 16             16-21, 22-28, 29-35, 36-43, 44-50, 52-60, 61-70.
*King of the hill Min level :16              16-21, 22-28, 29-35, 36-43, 44-50, 52-60, 61-70.
And more...

Currencies:

Copper [ 100 Copper = 1 Silver ]                Reals [ Can be bought on the DE bank shop ]

Silver [ 100 Silver = 1 Gold]

Gold [ No transfer ]

title: Dragon Eternity - Free game! [RPG]

replies.body:
Runescape Is kinda bad In my opinion. Dragon Eternity is better because they have more benefits than Runescape. Just sayin.

My Dragon Eternity Characters: Arboklv12 (Level 8)
                                                       Arbok_Plays_MC (Level 11)
